channel.title: Trade Log Help
channel.description: So I'm pretty sure noone really knows how to do this however.... how would I be able to mke a tardelog for a {shard} based source.

item.title: Trade Log Help
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

heatrn11:

So I’m pretty sure noone really knows how to do this however… how would I be able to mke a tardelog for a {shard} based source.

Everytime a trade is initiated add a check. If that boolean returns true (after a completed trade) have it write the items that were exchanged to a text document. The only way I can think of doing that is to loop through their inventory before the completed trade and log that and then log it afterwards and only write the ids of items that were different from the trade. This is probably a very poor way to do it though, but like I said, that’s the only way I could think of to do it.

Read full topic
